definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
see 心中無數|心中无数[xin1 zhong1 wu2 shu4]

sentences.english: virtue flies from the heart of a mercenary man.
sentences.chinese: 惟利是图者，胸中无美好的品德。

sentences.english: Is but the seemly raiment of my heart.
sentences.chinese: 只是我胸中这颗心合适的衣裳。

sentences.english: Feel - to the rising bosom's inmost core.
sentences.chinese: 感到在我们鼓胀的胸中最深的地方。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the application of video-assisted thoracoscopic surgery (VATS) in the treatment of traumatic hemothorax.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨电视胸腔镜在创伤性血胸中的应用。

sentences.english: He couldn't control the indignation that swelled in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 他无法抑制胸中涌起的义愤。

sentences.english: I tried to subdue my fury.
In the bosom of such as these the spirit dwells in rhythmic silence.
sentences.chinese: 在这些人的胸中，精神生活在沉默的节奏里。

sentences.english: Now my words, are frosted with every breath ?
sentences.chinese: 让话语和呼吸一起冰凝在胸中。

sentences.english: Now my words, Air Force 1 Classic Mid, are frosted with every breath.
sentences.chinese: 让话语和呼吸一块儿冰凝在胸中。

sentences.english: But the fever, allayed for an instant, gradually resumed possession of him.
sentences.chinese: 到这时，他胸中平息了一会的烦懑又渐渐起来了。
恻隐之心在她胸中起伏。

sentences.english: His eyes reflected the joy of his chest Haofang surging forward.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼中折射出欣喜，他的胸中奔涌着豪放。

definition: inner feelings/what is deep in one's heart
to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
pent-up frustrations/sth that has accumulated in one's mind for a long time
to rage/to dash/to surge/also written 激盪|激荡
to roll over and over (of billows or clouds)
to sprout up/to flourish/(of war etc) to break out/rapid growth
to feel oppressed/to be depressed/to feel dejected
to well up/to boil out/to bubble forth/to spurt
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
